originalText.text: As a member who monthly pay to come here, you can never get to use the basketball court. Which is a total scam. The weight room lack of machines and equipments. If you want to use the court, wake up 5:00 AM and get there at 6 am. And filled with little kids, running around. Nightmare to be here honestly. Ridiculous.

text.text: As a member who monthly pay to come here, you can never get to use the basketball court. Which is a total scam. The weight room lack of machines and equipments. If you want to use the court, wake up 5:00 AM and get there at 6 am. And filled with little kids, running around. Nightmare to be here honestly. Ridiculous.

originalText.text: Signed up for this gym because I was told the basketball court was open to use at all hours and typically empty. After I signed up, they informed me I could only use the gym after 9pm (closes at 10). After a few months, they informed me the gym was only available before 4pm (I have a job). After another month, they changed the hours to 5am-6am and 12pm-1pm for members. I and all the other usual users of the court tried to end our memberships and asked for the cancellation fee to be waived and they declined. This warping of hours for members took place for the pool as well. Do not sign up for this gym unless you are prepared for you - a paying member - to be placed last on the priority list.

After I signed up, they informed me I could only use the gym after 9pm (closes at 10). After a few months, they informed me the gym was only available before 4pm (I have a job). After another month, they changed the hours to 5am-6am and 12pm-1pm for members. I and all the other usual users of the court tried to end our memberships and asked for the cancellation fee to be waived and they declined. This warping of hours for members took place for the pool as well. Do not sign up for this gym unless you are prepared for you - a paying member - to be placed last on the priority list.

originalText.text: So the gym air conditioner is not working at all and they asked us to take a workout to the pool.But the pool is inaccessible most of the time for gym member(not accessible from around 9:30am to 7pm)and even on the weekend the amount of lane opened is really small. So I am not sure what to do at a gym except pay them monthly memebership.

originalText.text: Member for a couple years now but considering canceling. Maybe my expectations are excessive but the pool is consistently overcrowded in the AM regardless of time (4-5 per lane); lifeguards don’t actively manage (e.g. swim paces, lane closures). Gym equipment breaks frequently (two of five treadmills currently out of order) and only one of six men’s showers has hot water.

originalText.text: I have been a member here on and off for over 10 years and I really love the facilities and the atmosphere. It has a nice mix of family friendly energy as well as those seeking serious athletic performance. Personally I really appreciate the necks of children, elderly, and the more serious athletic types.
